p: Some of the products found in rose all, present in the highest percentages, are different types of terpenes. In vitro antiviral activity of citral has been demonstrated to block yellow fever virus replication [ 86]. Citral also inhibits infection with non-enveloped murine norovirus (MNV), the action being time-dependent and most likely due to nonspecific interactions with extracellular viral particles, which prevents its attachment to sensitive cells [ 87].
